summary: Successfully updated the 'Our Projects' section with a completely new design featuring 2 projects per slide in a slideshow format. Added an 'Experience Our Projects' video section with play/pause controls. The new layout includes project cards with hover effects, status badges, and smooth animations. Each slide now displays 2 projects side by side with staggered animations, and includes a video showcase section below the projects. Navigation controls and auto-play functionality have been updated to work with the new slide structure.
current_status: The projects section now features a modern 2-projects-per-slide layout with beautiful animations, hover effects, and an integrated video experience section. The slideshow automatically cycles through project pairs, and users can filter by project status. The video section includes play/pause controls and provides an immersive experience of the projects. All animations are smooth and the design is fully responsive.
